actionConfiguration.body:
SELECT 
pct.id,
cc.geo_region_id,
pct.vehicle_ids Vehicles,
pct.driver_vehicle_ids driver_vehicles,
pco."type",
CASE
    WHEN cc.period @> (SELECT CURRENT_DATE) THEN 'Active'
    WHEN lower(cc.period) <  (SELECT CURRENT_DATE) THEN 'Expired'
		ELSE 'Future'
END AS status,
cc.period Period, 
pco.commission_fraction as Commission,
pco.cap_amount as Cap_Amount,
pco.min_kms as Min_Kms,
pco.incv_km_cap as INCV_KM_CAP,
pco.per_km_rate as PER_KM_RATE
FROM vp.payout_campaigns pca
INNER JOIN vp.payout_configs pco ON pco.payout_campaign_id = pca.id
INNER JOIN vp.payout_campaign_targets pct ON pct.payout_campaign_id = pca.id
INNER JOIN vp.payout_cam_cam_config_joins pj ON pj.payout_campaign_id = pca.id
INNER JOIN vp.campaign_configs cc ON pj.campaign_config_id = cc.id
where cc.geo_region_id = pct.city_id
--where cc.period @> (SELECT CURRENT_DATE + 1)
order by pco.updated_at desc;
